text: Tsey khto vvazhayutʹ ta pryzvodyatʹ spravedlyva dovichna urodyty niyaka provyna yi budʹ-yake prodovolʹstvo, stilʹky, skilʹky vony ne zauvazhuyutʹ zapovidi, vvazhayutʹ ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya, todi pidtrymuyutʹ yikhniy piety ta vira, ta prodovzhuyutʹsya zauvazhyty piety ta righteousness. BOH lyubytʹ spravedlyvyy
